National League COLORADO ROCKIES--Named Jay Alves public relations director.

National Basketball Association CHICAGO BULLS--Signed G Dante Calabria, F Boris Gorene, G Rusty LaRue, F Kornel David, F Dwayne Whitfield and C Eric Gingold to one-year contracts. COLORADO ROCKIES--Named Jay Alves director of public relations. DENVER NUGGETS--Traded F Antonio McDyess to the Phoenix Suns for a minimum of three first-round and two second-round draft picks. DETROIT PISTONS--Signed F-C Don Reid to a multiyear contract and F Scot Pollard and F Charles O'Bannon. MIAMI HEAT--Signed F Ben Davis and G Malcolm Huckaby. MINNEASOTA TIMBERWOLVES--Agreed to terms with F Kevin Garnett on a six-year contract. NEW YORK KNICKS--Signed G Pete Myers. PHOENIX SUNS--Traded G Wesley Person and G Tony Dumas to the Cleveland Cavaliers for a first-round pick no earlier than 2000. VANCOUVER GRIZZLIES--Signed F Mark Hendrickson and F David Booth, C Alan Ogg and G Litterial Green.
Women's National Basketball Association WNBA--Awarded franchises to Detroit and Washington to begin play next season.

National Football League MIAMI DOLPHINS--Signed LB Mike Crawford and FB Jim Kitts. Signed OT Ron Collins to the practice squad. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Signed S Chris Hewitt to a one-year contract. Signed DE Duane Ashman, DB Earl Little and WR Gunnard Twyner to the practice squad. NEW YORK JETS--Agreed to terms with CB Aaron Glenn on a five-year contract extension. OAKLAND RAIDERS--Signed DE Aundray Bruce. TENNESSEE OILERS--Signed TE James McKeehan and WR Nate Singleton.

National Hockey League CAROLINA HURRICANES--Signed RW Kevin Dineen to a one-year contract extension, through the 1998-99 season and F Kevin Brown to a one-year contract. NEW JERSEY DEVILS--Assigned G Richard Shulmistra to Fort Wayne of the IHL. Placed D Sheldon Souray and C Sergei Brylin on injured reserve. NEW YORK RANGERS--Assigned C Christian Dube and D Geoff Smith to Hartford of the AHL. PITTSBURGH PENGUINS--Claimed F Peter Ferraro and F Chris Ferraro off waivers from the New York Rangers. Signed RW Rob Brown. Announced Joe Mullen has rejoined the team to work in the community and alumni relations departments.
American Hockey League BEAST OF NEW HAVEN--Released G Tripp Tracy and LW Andrew Taylor.

International Hockey League FORT WAYNE KOMETS--Released G Rob Laurie and G Jon Hillebrandt. Assigned C Eric Boguniecki and D Dave Froh to Dayton of the ECHL. HOUSTON AEROS--Announced Austin of the WPHL will serve as their developmental team. KANSAS CITY BLADES--Assigned F David Beauregard and D Dan Delisle to Wichita of the CHL.

METROPOLITAN INTERCOLLEGIATE BASKETBALL ASSOCIATION--Named Robert J. Byrnes president. BOWLING GREEN--Named Kurt Thomas golf coach-golf course director. CINCINNATI--Named Bob Goin athletic director. DREXEL--Named Dan Baker director of broadcast relations and corporate sales. FAIRLEIGH DICKINSON--Named Neal Biscaldi and Harry Moumdjian men's assistant basketball coaches. FLORIDA ATLANTIC--Named Doni O'Bryan and Keith Klahold graduate assistant trainers. FLORIDA TECH--Named Jennifer Mitchell assistant softball coach. KEAN--Announced the resignation of Jim Casalino, men's baseball coach. Named John Stallings sports information director. MAINE--Named Rick Filighera women's ice hockey coach. MARQUETTE--Named Brian Bidlingmyer men's assistant basketball coach. PITTSBURGH-JOHNSTOWN--Named Todd Williams baseball coach. RADFORD--Named Donnie Tickle assistant athletic director. RHODE ISLAND COLLEGE--Named Scott Gibbons assistant athletic director for media relations. SAINT JOHN FISHER--Named John Lonez men's and women's cross country coach. TEMPLE--Named Valerie Abbott assistant athletic director for advertising, promotions and ticket sales-women's interim senior administrator. TENNESSEE STATE--Named Vivian Fuller athletic director.
